message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $14,000. I believe it offers significant value, even beyond the asking price.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer, but $14,000 is a bit too high for me. I'm interested in the product, but I could only consider a price closer to $8,000.
Bob, thanks for your interest.  While $8,000 is too low, I'm willing to come down to $12,500. I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations.
Hi Alice, I appreciate you being willing to negotiate.  $12,500 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with.  Would you be willing to meet in the middle somewhere around $10,000?
